blocks.name: lmlim
blocks.content: Relate a limit in a given topology to a complex number limit, provided that topology agrees with the common topology on ` CC ` on the required subset. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Jul-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmlim(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cli, c2)))
  -| wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cn, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wceq(co(c1, crest, c4), co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c4))
  -| wss(c4, cc)
} = {
  3bitrd(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cli, c2), wbr(c0, cfv(clm, co(c1, crest, c4)), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(clm, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c4)), c2))
  lmss(c0, c1, c2, co(c1, crest, c4), c4, cn, nat1, universe, w0)
  eqid(co(c1, crest, c4))
  a1i(w0, wcel(c1, ctop))
  topontopi(c1, c3)
  a1i(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfv(clm, co(c1, crest, c4)), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(clm, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c4)), c2)))
  breqi(c0, cfv(clm, co(c1, crest, c4)), c2, cfv(clm, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c4)))
  fveq2i(clm, co(c1, crest, c4), co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c4))
  bitr3d(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(clm, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c4)), c2), wbr(c0, cli, c2), wbr(c0, cfv(clm, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)), c2))
  lmss(c0, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), c2, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c4), c4, cn, nat1, universe, w0)
  eqid(co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c4))
  ssexd(c4, cc, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cc, universe))
  cnex()
  a1i(w0, wss(c4, cc))
  a1i(w0, wcel(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), ctop))
  cnfldtop(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat1, cz))
  sylancr(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfv(clm, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)), c2), wbr(c0, cli, c2)), wcel(nat1, cz), wf(c0, cn, cc))
  1z()
  sylancl(w0, wf(c0, cn, cc), wf(c0, cn, c4), wss(c4, cc))
  fss(c0, cn, c4, cc)
  lmclimf(nat1, c0, cn, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), c2)
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  nnuz()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lmlim(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[(~~>t ` c1)]c2 ‚Üî c0[~~>]c2))
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (c1[|`t]c4)=((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c4)
  ‚ä£ c4 ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ
} = {
  3bitrd(w0, c0[(~~>t ` c1)]c2, c0[~~>]c2, c0[(~~>t `(c1[|`t]c4))]c2, c0[(~~>t `((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c4))]c2)
  lmss(c0, c1, c2, (c1[|`t]c4), c4, cn, nat1, universe, w0)
  eqid((c1[|`t]c4))
  a1i(w0, c1 ‚àà Top)
  topontopi(c1, c3)
  a1i(w0, (c0[(~~>t `(c1[|`t]c4))]c2 ‚Üî c0[(~~>t `((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c4))]c2))
  breqi(c0, (~~>t `(c1[|`t]c4)), c2, (~~>t `((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c4)))
  fveq2i(clm, (c1[|`t]c4), ((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c4))
  bitr3d(w0, c0[(~~>t `((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c4))]c2, c0[~~>]c2, c0[(~~>t `(TopOpen ` CCfld))]c2)
  lmss(c0, (TopOpen ` CCfld), c2, ((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c4), c4, cn, nat1, universe, w0)
  eqid(((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c4))
  ssexd(c4, cc, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, ‚ÑÇ ‚àà ùïå)
  cnex()
  a1i(w0, c4 ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ)
  a1i(w0, (TopOpen ` CCfld)‚àà Top)
  cnfldtop((TopOpen ` CCfld))
  a1i(w0, 1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  sylancr(w0, (c0[(~~>t `(TopOpen ` CCfld))]c2 ‚Üî c0[~~>]c2), 1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, (c0 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ))
  1z()
  sylancl(w0, (c0 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ), (c0 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c4), c4 ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ)
  fss(c0, cn, c4, cc)
  lmclimf(nat1, c0, cn, (TopOpen ` CCfld), c2)
  eqid((TopOpen ` CCfld))
  nnuz()
}

blocks.name: lmlimxrge0
blocks.content: Relate a limit in the nonnegative extended reals to a complex limit, provided the considered function is a real function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Jul-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmlimxrge0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cli, c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cn, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wss(c3, co(nat0, cico, cpnf))
} = {
  lmlim(c0, c1, c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c3, w0)
  eqeltri(c1, cfv(ctopon, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), co(cfv(cordt, cle), crest, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  mp2an(wcel(co(cfv(cordt, cle), crest, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cfv(ctopon, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), wcel(cfv(cordt, cle), cfv(ctopon, cxr)), wss(co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cxr))
  letopon()
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  resttopon(cfv(cordt, cle), cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  3eqtr4i(co(c1, crest, c3), co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c3), co(co(cfv(cordt, cle), crest, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), crest, c3), co(cfv(cordt, cle), crest, c3))
  mp3an(wceq(co(co(cfv(cordt, cle), crest, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), crest, c3), co(cfv(cordt, cle), crest, c3)), wcel(cfv(cordt, cle), universe), wss(c3, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), universe))
  fvex(cordt, cle)
  sstri(c3, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), co(nat0, cico, cpnf))
  icossicc(nat0, cpnf)
  ovex(nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  restabs(cfv(cordt, cle), universe, c3, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), universe)
  oveq1i(c1, crest, c3, co(cfv(cordt, cle), crest, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  eqtri(c1, co(cfv(cordt, cle), crest, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cfv(ctopn, co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  xrge0topn()
  ax-mp(wceq(co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c3), co(cfv(cordt, cle), crest, c3)), wss(c3, cr))
  xrrest2(c3, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), cfv(cordt, cle))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  eqid(cfv(cordt, cle))
  sstri(c3, cc, cr)
  sstri(c3, cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf))
  rge0ssre()
  ax-resscn()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lmlimxrge0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[(~~>t ` c1)]c2 ‚Üî c0[~~>]c2))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(TopOpen `(‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ c3 ‚äÜ(0[[,)]+‚àû)
} = {
  lmlim(c0, c1, c2, (0[[,]]+‚àû), c3, w0)
  eqeltri(c1, (TopOn `(0[[,]]+‚àû)), ((ordTop ` ‚â§)[|`t](0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  mp2an(((ordTop ` ‚â§)[|`t](0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àà(TopOn `(0[[,]]+‚àû)), (ordTop ` ‚â§)‚àà(TopOn ` ‚Ñù*), (0[[,]]+‚àû)‚äÜ ‚Ñù*)
  letopon()
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  resttopon((ordTop ` ‚â§), cxr, (0[[,]]+‚àû))
  3eqtr4i((c1[|`t]c3), ((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c3), (((ordTop ` ‚â§)[|`t](0[[,]]+‚àû))[|`t]c3), ((ordTop ` ‚â§)[|`t]c3))
  mp3an((((ordTop ` ‚â§)[|`t](0[[,]]+‚àû))[|`t]c3)=((ordTop ` ‚â§)[|`t]c3), (ordTop ` ‚â§)‚àà ùïå, c3 ‚äÜ(0[[,]]+‚àû), (0[[,]]+‚àû)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex(cordt, cle)
  sstri(c3, (0[[,]]+‚àû), (0[[,)]+‚àû))
  icossicc(nat0, cpnf)
  ovex(nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  restabs((ordTop ` ‚â§), universe, c3, (0[[,]]+‚àû), universe)
  oveq1i(c1, crest, c3, ((ordTop ` ‚â§)[|`t](0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  eqtri(c1, ((ordTop ` ‚â§)[|`t](0[[,]]+‚àû)), (TopOpen `(‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))))
  xrge0topn()
  ax-mp(((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c3)=((ordTop ` ‚â§)[|`t]c3), c3 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù)
  xrrest2(c3, (TopOpen ` CCfld), (ordTop ` ‚â§))
  eqid((TopOpen ` CCfld))
  eqid((ordTop ` ‚â§))
  sstri(c3, cc, cr)
  sstri(c3, cr, (0[[,)]+‚àû))
  rge0ssre()
  ax-resscn()
}

  1zzd(wa(wf(c0, cn, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wcel(cseq(nat1, caddc, c0), cdm(cli))))

  serfre(hs2, nat1, c0, cn, wf(c0, cn, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))

blocks.name: lmdvg
blocks.content: If a monotonic sequence of real numbers diverges, it is unbounded. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Aug-2017.)

blocks.name: lmdvglim
blocks.content: If a monotonic real number sequence ` F ` diverges, it converges in the extended real numbers and its limit is plus infinity. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Aug-2017.)

thm lmdvglim(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), cpnf))

  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cn, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cdm(cli))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), cpnf), wral(hs0, cr, wrex(hs1, cn, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))))
  lmdvg(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, w0)
  lmxrge0(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), w0)
  sylancl(w0, wf(c0, cn, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wf(c0, cn, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wss(co(nat0, cico, cpnf), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  icossicc(nat0, cpnf)
  fss(c0, cn, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  eqidd(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs1.s(s0)

  diff.hs1.w(w0)
